name: Blood Wars
description:
Somehow a virus has entered Humannie's blood stream and is hell bent on making her sick. Play as either the virus and infect other blood cells, turning them black and gross or play as the cure and change those gross, black cells back to their former, red glory.  Who will come out on top? Will Humannie even notice she's sick?

Fast rounds, easy to learn, hard to master! Prepare for some bloody good competitive, arcade-y action.

2 Player mode - WASD controls the cure, arrow keys control the virus

1 Player mode - Play as the cure while the AI controls the virus
